tern
  • Reference

Define a kmplot grob

create a grid graphical object for basic KM plot from a survfit object.

kmGrob(fit_km, col = NULL, xticks = NULL, title = "Kaplan - Meier Plot",
  gp = NULL, vp = NULL, name = NULL)

Arguments

fit_km

a class survfit object.
col

a vector of color for each line.
xticks

break interval of x-axis. It takes a numeric vector or NULL.
title

title for plot.

Examples

OS <- data.frame(AVAL = abs(rnorm(200)),
                 CNSR = sample(c(0, 1), 200, TRUE),
                 ARM = sample(LETTERS[1:3], 200, TRUE),
                 SEX = sample(c("M","F"), 200, TRUE),
                 RACE = sample(c("AA", "BB", "CC"), 200, TRUE),
                 ECOG = sample(c(0, 1), 200, TRUE))
fit_km <- survfit(Surv(AVAL, 1-CNSR) ~ ARM, data = OS, conf.type = "plain")
kmGrob(fit_km = fit_km, xticks = c(0.5, 0.8, 1.5))
#> kmGrob[GRID.kmGrob.269]
